messages.subject: Request/reminder for submissions
messages.msgSnippet: The month is just about half over and if you were thinking about contributing to Unschooling Voices, you have until the end of the month to get it in. :-)
messages.messageBody:
The month is just about half over and if you were thinking about
contributing to Unschooling Voices, you have until the end of the month
to get it in. :-)

Here's the information on how to submit your thoughts:
http://www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (8), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 2003
************************************
Unschooling Voices ~ Add Your Voice
www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html

messages.subject: Request/reminder for submissions
messages.msgSnippet: The third edition of Unschooling Voices is being put together and entries are due before September 1st. Click the link below for all the details, if you re a
messages.messageBody:
The third edition of Unschooling Voices is being put together and
entries are due before September 1st. Click the link below for all the
details, if you're a new participant...which we love!

Thank you to those who have already sent in your submissions! I
appreciate it. :-)

This month's (always optional) question has been submitted by a fellow
unschooling mom, so check it out and give her your thoughts. :-)

http://www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html


~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (8), Shawna (11) & Cimion (13)
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
